attributes.action: Preserve complete and total state ownership of Royal Mail Group and The Post Office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wish the Postal networks, systems and present obligations to operated and run by these institutions, Royal Mail Group and The Post Office, as a monopolised SERVICE to the British public, as opposed to a strictly for profit commercial enterprise; to aim to deliver a surplus through comprehensive, affordable, sustainable, and efficient provision of an end-to-end collection, transmission, and delivery service pertinent to letters, packages, and all non-hazardous items of most descriptions, to and from any part of these British Islands and Mainland for a standard price, universally provided.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
